Summary Note:
Clara Lucía Castro and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Madrid. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Clara Lucía Castro is a 34 year old Financial Advisor from Spain.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Clara Lucía Castro is currently divorced. She has 1 kid called Ruiz.
Education Background:
Clara received her secondary school diploma from IES Jorge Guillén Salamanca in 2010.
Clara earned her degree from Universidad Comercial de Deusto in 2015.
Occupation History:
Clara Lucía Castro is a 34 year old and comes from Spain.
At CaixaBank S.A., Clara Lucía Castro held the position of Financial Advisor from 2015 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 30000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has flat located in Logroño, worth 710000 EUR.

In 2019, she received an inheritance of 6890000 EUR from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Neurosurgeon, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Clara as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
